participant_1.background:
I relax by watching horror movies with my favorite snacks and enjoy my tattoos.
I love to ride my bike and get ice cream with my grandpa.
I have to study for my nursing exam this weekend, but I'm looking forward to relaxing outside with my friends after I'm finished.
I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist.

participant_2.background:
I travel a lot and my favorite people are the ones I meet along the way.
I am a homemaker and proud of my Italian-American heritage.
I am a social butterfly and love to meet new people, but I'd be terrible at being a tour guide.
I value my freedom and my time to do what I want.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a nursing student and I love horror movies.
Hi! I love to travel and meet new people. What's your favorite horror movie?
I love The Conjuring 2. I'm really looking forward to the third one!
I've never seen it! I'll have to check it out. What's your favorite thing about nursing school?
I love learning about the human body and helping people.
That's awesome! I'm a homemaker and I love taking care of my family.
That's great! I love my family too.
What's your favorite thing to do with them?
I love to go on bike rides and get ice cream.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love ice cream too.
What's your favorite kind of ice cream?
I love chocolate chip cookie dough!
Me too! That's my favorite too.
That's so funny! We should go get ice cream sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll text you my number.
